channel.title: Moparcraft Feedback/Suggestions
channel.description:
Well this site is fairly new, I think we should have a place to post feedback and suggestions about how to improve it and it's popularity. Post them here!
My feedback - The theme or should be changed so it flows more with the background

item.title: Moparcraft Feedback/Suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:8, topic:391063”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=487013.msg3569622#msg3569622 date=1302932429]

http://www.minecraftrealm.net/forum/

Best Minecraft forum theme on the internet currently (IMO).

Shameless advertising.
[/quote]

I’m actually not really a major part of that website. Cane runs it himself and does all the web designing himself. I’ve been on a few minecraft forums though and they always have bland themes (see: moparcraft ;)). Of all the sites I have browsed though I really like that design more then any other.

tl;dr: I’m not advertising but the shits just sexy.[/quote]

The theme is nice, goes with Minecraft well. But I have to admit I do like the good old SMF default theme

Though I still think a Minecraft related theme would be good.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Feedback/Suggestions
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I also like that theme

Also, on the subject of the current staff, the image says ‘MoparScape’ moderator, but this is a different site. Is it possible to have a different image for them (while keeping the same members) on this part of the site, as to not confuse any new people that join?

Read full topic
